update sys_category_item
CATEGORY_ID = #{categoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ITEM_VALUE = #{itemValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ITEM_NAME = #{itemName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ITEM_ORDER = #{itemOrder,jdbcType=INTEGER},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},

CREATE_USER = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LAST_UPDATE_TIME = #{lastUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
LAST_UPDATE_USER = #{lastUpdateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update sys_category_item set CATEGORY_ID = #{categoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ITEM_VALUE = #{itemValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ITEM_NAME = #{itemName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ITEM_ORDER = #{itemOrder,jdbcType=INTEGER}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATE_USER = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LAST_UPDATE_TIME = #{lastUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, LAST_UPDATE_USER = #{lastUpdateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select b.* from sys_category a inner join sys_category_item b on a.id = b.category_id where a.ID = #{ID,jdbcType=INTEGER} and b.STATUS = 1
select b.* from sys_category a inner join sys_category_item b on a.id = b.category_id where b.CATEGORY_ID = #{CATEGORY_ID,jdbcType=INTEGER} and b.STATUS = 1
